title: Constructivist-Based Foundational Programming and Computational Thinking Enhancement Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic computer literacy and foundational logical thinking skills
context.additional_context: A blended learning course combining game-based learning elements with project-based assessments in a mobile environment using digital devices.

learning_goals: Learners can design simple programs by utilizing sequential and concurrent programming concepts.
Learners enhance computational thinking skills through collaborative activities in mobile-based microlearning environments.
Learners can apply programming concepts in real-world problem-solving processes via project-based assessments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
